system.description: “Sometimes your best ally is a flickering echo of bad code.” Target 1 weapon within Far, Spend 1 Hope and make a Spellcasting check (12).  On a success, any non-primative weapon malfunctions and requires an action to clear it, and thereafter has a -1 for any Action using it.
